summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from November 1 to November 30, 2013. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and fees, highlighting significant transactions and the ending balance for the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Mark F. Tollison
persons.context: Mark F. Tollison is referenced in relation to a check transaction from the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $200,000 was made into the account.

events.title: Incoming Money
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $50,932.56 was recorded.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $10,225.04 was made to Bank of America.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for November 2013, including significant deposits and withdrawals.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person for account inquiries.
Mark F. Tollison is associated with a check transaction on November 20, 2013.
The account had a beginning balance of $198,382.56 and an ending balance of $253,127.76 as of November 30, 2013.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made throughout the month, primarily for tax services.
